mapper.select: SELECT u.id as userId, u.name as userName, c.id as classId, c.name as className FROM user u JOIN student_class sc ON u.id = sc.student_id JOIN class c ON sc.class_id = c.id WHERE u.id = #{studentId} AND u.role = 'student'

SELECT p.id as problemId, p.title as problemTitle, t.id as tagId, t.name as tagName, cs.score as classScore FROM class_problem cp JOIN problem p ON cp.problem_id = p.id LEFT JOIN class_score cs ON cp.id = cs.class_problem_id JOIN problem_tag pt ON p.id = pt.problem_id JOIN tag t ON pt.tag_id = t.id WHERE cp.class_id = #{classId} AND (cs.sc_id = #{studentId} OR cs.sc_id IS NULL)

SELECT p.id as problemId, p.title as problemTitle, t.id as tagId, t.name as tagName, c.id as classId, c.name as className FROM problem p JOIN class_problem cp ON p.id = cp.problem_id JOIN problem_tag pt ON p.id = pt.problem_id JOIN tag t ON pt.tag_id = t.id JOIN class c ON cp.class_id = c.id WHERE t.id = #{tagId} AND c.id = #{classId}
